question:
A number x is 32% of a number y. If y is 20% of z, what is z in terms of x?
A. \(0.064x\)
B. \(0.64x\)
C. \(6.4x\)
D. \(\frac{x}{0.064}\)
E. \(\frac{x}{0.64}\)
Kudos for
